hero.heading: Inviting 100, 1000, 10 thousand guests? Possible with Virtuwed!
hero.subheading: A wedding platform that makes your celebration accessible anytime, anywhere, with unlimited guest capacity.

award: Nominated as Startup Of The Year, Asia Pacific ICT Awards, APICTA 2023 [Hong Kong]

feature.heading: Virtuwed is the first virtual wedding platform in Indonesia with the most complete features
feature.subheading: Bring your wedding experience into the virtual world

features.title: Premium Digital Invitations
features.body: Send your Digital Invitations Exclusively, Safely and Reliably

features.title: 360-Degree Virtual Memories
features.body: View unforgettable memories at anytime, accessible at anytime

value.title: Virtuwed: Expanding Your Wedding's Reach Easily and Affordably
value.body: Bid farewell to weddings limited by cost, distance, and time. Virtuwed expands virtual guest capacity, accessible from anywhere, and at an affordable cost.

value.title: Exclusive Digital Invitations, Sent Securely
value.body: Worried about digital invitation scams? With Virtuwed, we ensure the secure delivery of your exclusive digital invitations through our official WhatsApp.

value.title: Celebrate Your Wedding Anytime, Anywhere, with Any Number of Guests
value.body: Our platform can host hybrid weddings (Live and Virtual) with 360-degree Live Streaming, ensuring guests can feel the atmosphere of your wedding from wherever they are!

value.title: Receive Digital Gifts from Invited Guests
value.body: Guests can choose and send symbolic household items as wedding gifts to you. We then convert the value of these items into funds deposited into your account.

value.title: View and Preserve Unforgettable 360-Degree Wedding Moments
value.body: Our Virtual Memories capture 360-degree photos and videos of the ceremony, blessings, and reception. Relive every moment without constraints from your photographer's camera angles.

pricing.heading: Pricing Plans
pricing.subheading: Customize your wedding journey with pricing plans that suit you best.
lite: Digital Invitations for 200 Guests, Sent via Virtuwed's Official Account
priority: Digital Invitations for 500 Guests, Sent via Virtuwed's Official Account

review.heading: What people think about us
review.subheading: We prioritize enhancing customer experience, consistently delivering exceptional service and satisfaction.

video: Explore our comprehensive guide for beginners on navigating our virtual wedding platform

faq.question: What is Virtuwed?
faq.answer: Virtuwed is a virtual wedding platform featuring digital invitations, a 360 platform, photo gallery, video call, live streaming, and more.

faq.question: What are the key features offered by Virtuwed?
faq.answer: Key features include digital invitations, digital gifts, virtual reception, wedding photo gallery, video call, and wedding live streaming.

faq.question: What packages does Virtuwed offer?
faq.answer: There are 2 packages: VIRTUWED Premium (2 Million Rupiah) for intimate weddings, and VIRTUWED Priority (10 Million Rupiah) with more professional services.

faq.question: Is there an additional cost for adding guests to VIRTUWED Premium?
faq.answer: Yes, adding 100 guests incurs an additional fee of Rp.50,000.

faq.question: Why choose Virtuwed for your wedding?
faq.answer: Virtuwed provides an economical and innovative solution to create an unforgettable wedding with affordable costs and accessibility from anywhere.
